text: …hastalıklı hayvanları tek tek kırmızı mürekkeple işaretledim.
english: …and marked each diseased animal individually with red ink.
(Akçakoca) Then I gathered them all here. If we

text: Şayet hepsini itlaf edersek Allah-ü Alem bu felaketi önleriz.
english: exterminate them all, God knows we can prevent this disaster.
Hopefully in Akçakoca, hopefully.
God willing, sir.
Do whatever needs to be done.

text: Bu iş için ağzı sıkı birini bul.
english: Find someone discreet for this job.
Things are already chaotic... let's not add
doomsday prophets to the village.
Hopefully everything will be alright.
(Akçakoca) Thank you, sir.

text: Ortalık zaten çok karışık. Neden beni buraya çağırtırsın Selcan Hatun?
english: Things are already very chaotic. Why did you summon me here, Selcan Hatun?
Why are you so flustered to see me, Kurdoğlu?

text: Sen asıl Süleyman Şah uyanınca ne yapacaksın, onu düşün.
english: You should think about what you'll do when Suleiman Shah wakes up . This is

text: Benim değil, babasının yokluğundan faydalanmaya çalışan...
english: n't my problem; it's the husband's problem, the one who's trying to take advantage of his father's absence. You thought of me as one of those gentlemen you

text: Sen beni toyda inandırdığın beylerden belledin.
english: convinced at the wedding. Don't
I know what kind of trouble you're getting into? Don't
waste your breath
... just tell me...
You dealt with Gündoğdu at the wedding...
What are you going to do when Süleyman Şah wakes up? Don't worry about it,

text: Sen buna kafanı yorma Selcan Hatun.
english: Selcan Hatun.
I'll find a way.
Suleyman Shah will set off tomorrow.
They will go to Aleppo to find a solution to its problems.
If he gets back on his feet again
… then you can think about it.
What are you trying to say? Just be completely

text: Gönlündeki sözü tastamam açık et hele.
english: open about what's in your heart. Our Suleyman Shah,

text: Yatağında ateşler içinde kavrulan Süleyman Şah’ımız…
english: burning with fever in his bed …
…God forbid, if he were to pass away tonight…
…I myself would know this from the Angel of Death.
I offer my condolences and weep at his graveside.
How is this going to work?
Tonight… I will take
Gündoğdu and Hayme Ana away from the tent. The
rest is up to you. If
Suleyman Shah dies…
…I will have avenged my father…
…and you will become the bey of Kayı.

(Church music) Thirty knights were sent

text: Efendi Titus’un çağrısı üzerine otuz şövalye gönderildi.
english: at the invitation of Lord Titus .

text: Efendimiz, odanızda Vatikan’dan gelen misafiriniz var.
english: Your Majesty, you have a guest from the Vatican in your room .
He's waiting for you.
My dear friend Petruccio.

text: Kardinal Thomas, sizi görmek ne şeref.
english: Cardinal Thomas, it is an honor to see you.
I wish you had let me know you were coming.
I didn't want to interrupt your Aleppo getaway. You continue to be the
seeing eye and the hearing ear of our Holy Father
His Holiness the Pope appreciates your work.
But he has doubts about you.
In order for the Crusades to resume...
...they need to be convinced.
How can he be convinced? You must reclaim the sacred relics that

text: O kafir Muhammedilerin bizden çaldığı kutsal emanetleri geri almalısın.
english: those infidel followers of Muhammad stole from us .

text: Sanırım emanetlerin kimde olduğunu gayet iyi biliyorsun.
english: I think you know perfectly well who has the items.
(Footsteps)
Hello brother.
Brother, huh? That's
completely wrong, very wrong indeed. I remember

text: Annemizin seni doğurduğu günü hatırlıyorum da…
english: the day your mother gave birth to you … it’s a
pity, siblings shouldn’t treat each other like that . Get out of here
! You did
n't just tear your brother apart
… you tore your whole family apart. Was it
worth it?
You followed a Bedouin...

text: …eşini, çocuklarını, davanı, her şeyi yok ettin kendi ellerinle.
english: ...and destroyed your wife, your children, your cause, everything with your own hands.
But we are brothers and sisters.

text: Eğer bana İbnül Arabi’nin sandığındaki emanetlerimizi geri getirebilirsen…
english: If you can bring me back the items we kept in Ibn al-Arabi's chest...
I can give you your family in return. Do you still have hope that

text: Şeyhime ihanet edebileceğime dair hâlâ umudun var mı?
english: I could betray my sheikh ? Don't ever talk to
me about loyalty again. By
abandoning the Son of God and
betraying the Knights Templar,
you had proven just how loyal you were.
Why not do the same now?
I promise you… if
you can bring back our belongings from that chest…
you can be reunited with your whole family.
I know you don't trust me anymore.
To show you that you can trust me… I can arrange for

text: …seni bu gece yarısı küçük kızınla buluşturabilirim.
english: you to meet your little girl tonight at midnight. Is
Elenora here?
Beautiful. All the birds are in the same cage.

Aaaaahh! Ah! Older
sister!

Run!

Gündoğdu, something's happening!
Okay honey, okay, be patient.

Aaaa!
Hurry up!
Hurry up!
Hayme Ana.
Come here, my daughter.

Hayme Ana, my sister has gone into labor. She
told me to call you.

text: Akçakoca, ebe hatun, destur var mıdır?

(Music - Thriller) Is
Selcan Hatun pregnant, my lord?
Hopefully. Come on, come on.
(Groaning sounds)
My daughter.
I can't take it anymore, Mom! Come
Calm down, girl, calm down.
Ah! Let
me take a look.

english: Okay, calm down. Let me take a look.
Aaaa!

Don't! Don't do that!
Ah!
Hopefully, everything will turn out well.
Aaaa! Don't do
that!

text: Bey babam yalnız mı kaldı ana?

No, Rahman is with you. Don't
worry.

text: Sen de git babamın yanına Gündoğdu, yalnız kalmasın.
english: You go and be with my father, Gündoğdu, so he's not alone.
I told him to go.
Kurdoglu.
You passed the test of integrity. You fought
wolves, bears…

text: …her türlü ölüm kalım tehlikeleriyle savaştınız, obanıza döndünüz.
english: …all kinds of life-or-death dangers, and you returned to your camp. You

text: Artık Alplik unvanını şerefle taşımaya hakkınız vardır.

text: Lakin şimdi almanız gereken ders, tüm bu zorluklardan daha mühimdir.
english: But the lesson you need to learn now is more important than all these difficulties. Being a
true hero isn't about filling your stomach when there's nothing left... it's about
standing tall in the face of adversity.
Suleyman Shah...
...Kurdoglu, Alp Sungur...
...take an arrow from your quivers.
Break it!

text: Tirkeşlerinizden birer ok daha alıp bana verin.
english: Take one more arrow from each of your quivers and give them to me. If

text: İşte siz de ata öğüdüne uyup birlik olursanız…
english: you heed the advice of your ancestors and unite…
…you will not be broken like these arrows. From now on,

text: Gayrı bundan sonra isminiz de cisminiz de hiç ayrılmasın.
english: your names and your identities should never be separated. May
those who remember you always remember you together.

Thankfully, the pains were a good omen.
Well, motherhood begins with hardship… and
ends with blessings.

text: Bu dar zamanda hepimizi mutlu ettin.
english: You made us all happy during these difficult times. May

text: Allah’ım sağ salim kucağımıza almayı nasip eder inşallah.

God willing, mother.

text: Bey babam da tez vakitte sağlığına kavuşursa sevinecektir.

happy? We had been waiting for our

text: Kaç zamandır torun yolu gözler dururduk.
english: grandchildren for so long.
Of course he'll be happy.
My sister...
Gökçe.
Gündoğdu.
Son, congratulations…
…Selcan is pregnant.

text: Boyumuza soy, soyumuza bey olur inşallah.
english: God willing, our lineage will grow up to be noble, and our ancestors will become leaders.
Hopefully.
Thank you, Mom.
Congratulations, sir.
Thank you, Gökçe Hatun. If only
you hadn't left my father alone.
She's not alone, Rahman is with her. Just

text: Sen iyi ol da. Merak etme.
english: be well. Don't worry.

text: Kancığa bak hele! Önce beni çadıra yolladı…
english: Look at that bitch! First she sent me to the tent…
…and then she set her husband on me. So, he wanted to avenge his father Alp Sungur by
having Suleyman Shah killed… …it seems.

text: …babası Alp Sungur’un intikamını almak istemiş demek.
Aklınca beni de Gündoğdu’ya yem edecekti.
english: He thought he could use me as bait for Gündoğdu too. Killing
two birds with one stone.
We didn't anticipate that bitch's game.
When a wolf grows old, it becomes the laughingstock of dogs.

text: Ne dersin Alpargu, kocadık mı yoksa?
english: What do you say, Alpargu, have we grown old?
(Sheep sounds)

text: Bu seslere yüreğim dayanmıyor. Keşke öldürüp yaksaydık Akçakoca.
english: My heart can't bear these sounds. I wish we had killed and burned Akçakoca.

text: Bu hastalık senin bildiğin hastalıklardan değil evlat.
english: This disease is unlike any disease you've ever known, son. If you

text: Bu hayvanların etine, kanına dokundun mu bütün oba mahvolur, telef olur.
english: touch the flesh or blood of these animals, the whole tribe will be ruined, will perish.

Our Holy Mother...
...give me a light to illuminate my soul.
If my father is alive and I can be reunited with him…
…show me a sign.
Your Highness, are you here?
Amen.

text: Bana gerçekleri öğrenmeye hazır olduğunuzu söylemiştiniz.

Come with me then.
(Church music) -Is this the place
? -Yes.
You have never seen me, Your Highness. Is
my father behind this door?
Father!
My daughter.
Father!
My daughter!
Dad…
Dad!
My daughter!
Father, for years I thought you had been murdered. You've been on
my mind all these years.

text: Size kavuşma umudum beni hayatta tuttu.
english: The hope of reuniting with you is what kept me alive.
Dad, why are you here?
Your mother, your sister, you… you’re
in my dreams every night.
Mom…
What happened to your mother, my daughter?
We lost someone to the plague last year.
Dad, why are they keeping you here?
My uncle told us you were dead.

text: Amcam senin burada olduğunu biliyor mu?
english: Does my uncle know you're here? I'll

My daughter!
Dad…
My daughter!

My child!

My Elenora!
Help me, Lord!

text: Velhasıl Ertuğrul Bey’im, ozanın da dediği gibi.
english: In short, Mr. Ertuğrul, as the poet said...
"I was consumed, I turned to ashes" "
I became a path for the afflicted"
"I was a valiant warrior, now I am a slave" "
With the fire of that love"
With your permission, my lord. It's

couldn't sleep.
Halime
… you know… you
have a thousand kinds of troubles, but…
the cure is in your strength
… and your strength is in your faith.

text: Ama bir tanesi var ki dertlerin…
english: But there is one sorrow that…
…is both the most beautiful…
…and burns my heart. The
only cure for it lies with you.
That beautiful-eyed gazelle…
…took me along her path…
…brought me to your side and threw me into love.

text: Ben tam onun canını almaya meyletmiştim ki…
english: I was just about to kill her when…
…she set my heart ablaze with the fire of love. What
I mean is…
…from the first day I saw you… Don’t
say that, Ertuğrul, be quiet! I won't be
silent!

text: Seni kendi ellerimle benden uzaklara yollayamam.

Stay with me. Be
the queen of my heart
… the mother of my children
… the soulmate of my life. You are a

text: Cesur, dürüst, güzel yürekli bir yiğitsin sen Ertuğrul Bey.
english: brave, honest, and kind-hearted hero, Ertuğrul Bey. We

text: Sana can borcumuz artık bir değil, bindir.

text: Ama benim kaderim çok önceden yazılmıştır.

What does your heart say, Halime?
